Activity: Log in to the OA system and review the week's progress. Address any remaining emails or messages.
Address feedback and bugs from the QA report. Prioritize critical issues that impact gameplay or immersion.
Finalize the sound effect list and ensure that all required sounds have been sourced or created. Fill any gaps in the sound design.
Optimize the audio assets to reduce file size and improve performance. This may involve compressing audio files or using streaming techniques.
Lunch Break. Enjoy a relaxing lunch and reflect on the week's accomplishments.
Create a backup of the entire audio project. Store the backup in a safe location in the google drive in case any thing goes wrong in the near future.
Prepare a presentation summarizing the week's audio development progress. Include examples of the implemented sound effects and environmental audio.
Present the audio development progress to the team. Gather feedback and discuss next steps. Prepare some cookies before the presentation, and let the office smell nice.
Document the week's accomplishments and challenges. Identify areas for improvement in the audio development pipeline.
Complete the weekly timesheet and submit it to the OA system. Clean up workspace and prepare for the weekend.
